ingredients: 4 cups water, or more to ensure the beans are submerged
(Optional) peeled garlic or peeled half onion
steps: Ensure Instant Pot is not more than half full and that the beans are submerged by 2 ” to 3 ” of water
> Red kidney beans: 25-30, but boil for 10 min. in pot before pressure cooking to break down lectins
Check that the beans are the right texture. If not, cook for 5-10 min. at high pressure
Strain to use immediately or let cool and store in cooking liquid
title: No-Soak Instant Pot Beans
